title: How ‘Ya Gonna Keep ‘Em Down on the Farm? After They’ve Seen Paree
post: Looks like scary stuff.  Pity they’ve discovered the Shroud.  Get ready for the next set of wacky ideas.  They could be right about Paul’s shipwreck off the coast of Malta, I’ve seen the video, they’ve found the anchors, looks credible.  Only in America?  No! we have ’em here too!
author: daveb of wellington nz
